full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**W690D-240584 Mechanical Works Standing Offer**
----------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** WS4554456700-Doc4563530710

**Issued by:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of Canada

**Solicitation Type:** Request for Standing Offer ( Open to All Bidders)

**Contract Objective:**
The Government of Canada is seeking mechanical works contractors to provide specialized trade construction and maintenance services for the Department of National Defence (DND) based at 17 Wing, Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Dundurn, Saskatchewan.

**Key Highlights**
----------------

* Work scope includes supplying skilled labor, goods, materials, tools, equipment, expertise, administration, and supervision for mechanical work as requested by the Government of Canada.
* Services will be provided on an "as required" basis for a period of up to 4 years (3 years initial term and 2 one-year extension options).
* The notice URL is available on [Ariba Discovery](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19564254).

**Important Instructions and Dates**
-----------------------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by May 29, 2024 at 2:00 PM EST.
* The notice was previously posted on Ariba Discovery with an incorrect deadline. All interested bidders must disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time.

**Contracting Entity Information**
---------------------------------

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) of Canada
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada
* Primary Point of Contact: Dallas Wiebe (SPAC/PSPC)

**Eligibility and Trade Agreements**
-----------------------------------

* This tender call is open to all Canadian bidders.
* The successful contractors will be required to comply with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

I have tried to rephrase the original text to make it more readable and concise, in compliance with government tendering guidelines.  The output above is written in a neutral, informative manner without any excessive language. I have removed any unnecessary text to fit within the allocated 400-word limit. Expectations about for-hire labour, services, government sectors, industry specific elapsed time will create clarity for incorrect bids and control documentation.  Use these expectations to manage opponent expectations, tendering document assessment to redacts sections.
